attributes.description:
2017 Mercedes-Benz E-Class E 300 Coupe AMG, Only 39 800 Km’s, Full Service History from Mercedes Benz, Almost new condition, Lots of Extra’s, Only R 699 950.00, 

LET ME TELL YOU WHY I LOVE THIS CAR?

This is one of the most luxurious Mercedes Benz I have had the absolute pleasure of driving around in for the weekend, Let me just tell you that I am in love. This is a different car to its predecessor, no comparison what so ever. In my opinion the previous E-Class let the brand down in terms of luxury, I mean this is an E-Class after all, it’s a special car, and this one in particular reminds me of a baby S-Class Coupe. 
The amount of features this vehicle possesses is mind boggling, here is the long list of factory options that you will not see on every E-Class, these cost a lot of money and increase your build sheet cost by significant amounts:

INCLUDES PREMIUM 3 PACKAGE

•	 Active Distance Assist DISTRONIC, ® Active Steering Assist
•	 Active Blind Spot Assist, Active Lane Keeping Assist
•	 Evasive Steering Assist, Active Lane Change Assist
•	 Active Brake Assist with Cross-Traffic Function
•	 Congestion Emergency Braking, Active Emergency Stop Assist
•	 Active Speed Limit Assist30
•	 PRE-SAFE PLUS31
•	 Surround View System, Head-Up Display26



AMG ADVANCED LIGHTING PACKAGE

•	 LED Intelligent Light System
•	 Adaptive High beam Assist
•	 Lowered sport suspension w/selective damping system
•	 AMG body styling, grille w/integrated Star



ENTERTAINMENT AND NAVIGATION

•	12.3" high-resolution color central screen
•	COMAND® system w/console-mounted touchpad/rotary controller
•	12.3" widescreen instrument cluster
•	High-resolution color multifunction display
•	COMAND hard-drive navigation,6 voice control w/learning feature
•	Hands-free Bluetooth® interface
•	Smartphone Integration w/Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto8
•	Inductive wireless charging with NFC pairing19
•	Burmester® Surround Sound System
•	Bluetooth audio streaming, dual USB ports, SD card reader

attributes.description:
2013 Volvo XC60 T5 Excel Auto, One genuine lady owner from new, Full agent history, 149 800 Km’s Immaculate condition Only R 229 950.00
You know in today’s times with higher used car prices than normal, it gives us great pleasure to present to you this special vehicle. Talk about value for money, I don’t think you will be able to beat this. I always say that you simply cannot comp0are a one owner full agent service history vehicle too any others out there, and this is no exception. This car is spotless in every way. 
We love Volvo’s they are one of the safest family cars in the world with a 5 star N-Cap rating and they are built properly. I mean which family sized SUV can you buy today that competes with this in terms of style, safety and everything that goes with a family sized SUV. 
If you are looking at getting a bigger vehicle but want something different to the rest out there, then come through and have a look at this one, it’s a safe bet and will give you many many years of trouble free safe motoring. 
We look at 1000’s of cars and only purchase a select few for resale purposes, we have stringent checklists and tests that each of our vehicles go through and this one passed every test with flying colours.
